question:
Buatlah kalimat berikut present perfect tensse 2. He (study) English for 3 years.    3.1 (live) in Kebumen for 15 years.

4.1 (smoke) since I was a child. 5. They (eat) it all.

6. We (work) for 5 hours.

8. We (submit) the assignment on time 9. He (do) it perfectly​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. He has studied English for 3 years.

3. I have lived in Kebumen for 15 years.

4. I have smoked since I was a child.

5. They have eaten it all.

6. We have worked for 5 hours.

8. We have submitted the assignment on time.

9. He has done it perfectly.

Formula:

S + have or has + past participle.

S + have not (haven't) or has not (hasn't) + past participle

Jawaban:

kamu sudah makan bahasa inggris nya adalah Have you eaten

Penjelasan:

semoga bermanfaat

related_questions.question:
19. The opposite of poor is ...
*
rich
O O O
O lazy
O handsome
O
O
smart​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

rich

Penjelasan:

Kebalikan dari miskin adalah kaya, dalam bahasa Inggris "rich"

related_questions.question:
18. Wulan     : What is your plan tonight?
Arbi
: I will watch a movie at home
Wulan : What movie are you going to watch?
Arbi : I don't know yet. Perhaps I will watch drama movie.
Wulan : You should watch education movie. It's good to add our knowledge.
Arbi : It sounds good to me.
The underline sentence in the dialogue above shows the expression of....
a. asking for plan
d. giving advice
b. asking for help
e. giving information
C. asking for advice
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. Asking for plan.

Penjelasan:

Ini jawabannnya ya.

Terima Kasih.

klo salah maap ya :)

related_questions.question:
2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together    FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm
CLAIR Thanks. Dad
I'm afraid you can't
C. Yes, you can
I'm sorry, I need the car
D. No, thanks​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together

FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm

CLAIR Thanks. Dad

I'm afraid you can't

C. Yes, you can

I'm sorry, I need the car

D. No, thanks​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan ditentukan dari reaksi Clair yang berterima kasih pada ayahnya, maka jawabannya adalah poin C. Yes, you can. Pilihan lain semuanya salah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question: Contoh soal pilihan ganda neither nor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

contoh soal pilihan ganda neither nor

1. Neither Budi .......... Badu came to the party last night.

a. or

b. nor

c. and

d. but

Penjelasan:

Kalimat di atas merupakan contoh soal pilihan ganda dari neither nor yang jawabannya adalah poin b. nor.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question:
6. "Would you mind not closing the window?"    The sentence has the same meaning with :
A. Do not close the window, please.
B. Close the window, please,
C. The window must be closed
D. Don't open the window, please.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Do not close the window, please.
